extension.name: BootCMS
extension.author: Stavros Androulidakis
extension.description: The 'Clean Bootstrap' template by BootCMS, provides the Bootstrap framework of HTML, CSS and JS works in a Joomla CMS environment. The code has been kept to a minimum to save resources. Nevertheless, the set-up is very flexible by using CDN to swap Bootswatch themes on a matter of seconds. Experienced web-masters could also use the 'Clean Bootstrap' template, to save time on the first steps, when they create their own template or built a website based on Bootstrap framework.

field.name: note0
field.label: BootCMS Joomla Clean Bootstrap Template
field.description:
'Clean Bootstrap' is a Joomla Template by BootCMS. It is based on the Bootstrap framework and gives the ability to use with just one click any of the Bootswatch themes. Aim to be as light as a feather, we used the minimum code. Nevertheless, it is highly configurable without a need to write any line of code. With a few clicks in Advanced Edit Style page, several options such as Header Text and Image, Background Image, Bootstrap Skins and Options, and more can be change in seconds. Enjoy, and remember in www.afunkystyle.com, more professional templates are available.

BootCMS scaffolding provides 4 + 1 positions to place the Joomla modules

  • navbar - to be used only for the navigation bar (Main Menu).
  • user1 - works only in the Home page, to be used for the Hero Unit (Jumbotron).
  • right - on any page except the Home page, to be used for any module.
  • footer - on all of the pages, to be used as page footer.
  • Content - the default Joomla space for the articles.
